entry.title: Factory Tested Ford PowerStroke 6.0L Pre-programmed FICM for 9/22/2003-2004 F Series & 9/22/2003-1/31/2005 Excursion
entry.summary:
Vendor: Diesel Parts Canada
Type: Components
Price: 300.00

Ford PowerStroke 6.0L Preprogrammed Remanufactured FICM for 9/22/2003-2004 F Series & 9/22/2003-1/31/2005 Excursion


OEM Part Numbers: 4C3Z12B599ABRM / AB

Engines built ON OR AFTER 9/22/2003

Application:

9/22/2003-2004 F Series

9/22/2003-1/31/2005 Excursion

OEM replacement modules come unprogrammed and must be programmed bythe installer. If you don't have programming capabilities, OEM replacements can often be difficult and costly to install. Additionally, OEM Half Shells cannot be confirmed as an effective repair in all situations, as the OEM's have specific diagnostic procedures to determine if it's even an option. We've eliminated the hassle. Our pre-programmed FICM will allow on-site repair to get your vehicle mobile again. Benefits ofthe Alliant PowerFuel Injection Control Module include:
  • Pre-programmed and calibrated to OEM Specs
  • Saves time and money
  • Three part numbers that offer complete coverage
  • 13 month unlimited mile warranty

entry.title: Stanadyne Winter 1000 Diesel Fuel Additive
entry.summary:
Vendor: Diesel Parts Canada
Type: Additive
Price: 84.00

Economic cold weather protection

  • Fuel Gelling Protection - pour point reduced by as much as 40°F (22°C), depending on base fuel
  • Reduces ice formation of water in fuel
  • Contains no alcohol
  • Specially formulated for ultra low sulfur diesel
  • Can be used with bio diesel up to B20 (20% bio content)

 

Size 16 oz Pint (470 ml) 5 Gallons (19 L)
Package Quantity 12 1
Treatment (1:1000) 125 gal (470 L) 5,000 gal (19,200 L)

entry.title: Ford PowerStroke 6.0L OE Injector for engines built on or after 9/22/2003 (Complete Set)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Diesel Parts Canada
Type: Injectors
Price: 3480.00

(Complete Set)
Ford PowerStroke 6.0L OE Injector for engines built on or after 9/22/2003
These OE remanufactured injectors are covered by a 24 month unlimited kilometre warranty on all Ford applications. Every injector is rebuilt to OE specifications using new coil and harness assemblies and new spool valves design to eliminate stiction. 

 

NOTE: See specific applications below to make sure they match your vehicle.

***Now covered under a 2 year manufacturer warranty.*** 

OEM Part Numbers: 4C3Z9E527AA / BRM

Notes: Engines built ON OR AFTER 9/22/2003

Applications:

9/22/2003-2007 F-250 / F-550, Excursion

2005-2007 F-650 / F-750

2004-2010 E Series

2006-2010 4.5L LCF

entry.title: 2004-2010 6.0L Right Glow Plug Harness
entry.summary:
Vendor: Diesel Parts Canada
Type: Electrical Harness and Repair
Price: 79.00

2004-2010 6.0L Right Glow Plug Harness

Protect your vehicle against potential oil leaks, a hard start or no start condition with, this Diesel Glow Plug Harness. Providing power to the vehicle glow plugs, this direct replacement harness is constructed of high quality materials for long-lasting durability.

  • Direct replacement for a proper fit every time
  • Easy to install
  • No special tools required for installation
  • Manufactured to strict engineering quality standards
Alternate part numbers: 1845794C92, 4C2Z-12A690AB, and 904-453

Loctite 242 Threadlocker Medium Strength, Removable

Removable strength, general purpose threadlocking adhesive well suited for fasteners between 1/4" and 3/4" diameter (6 to 20 mm). Applied to threaded components before assembly, parts can be separated using hand tools.

Dielectric Grease 0.33 oz Tube

Provides a moisture-proof barrier that lubricates and protects electrical equipment from salt, dirt, and corrosion. High dielectric strength. Good thermal, oxidation, and chemical stability.
